sourcesContent:
<template lang="pug">
  div.padding.high.light(style="padding-top: 6rem")
    
    //- Contents
    div.card.padding-medium.margin
      div.flex.wide.justify-space-between
        h2 Users
        //- Right
        input(type="search")

      table.wide
        thead
          tr
            th Name
            th Account Type
            th Actions
        tbody
          tr(v-for="account in $store.getters.allUsers")
            td {{account.account_name}}
            td {{account.account_type}}
            td
              button.margin-left-small(v-if="account.account_type=='USER'") Make Admin
              button.margin-left-small(v-if="account.account_type=='USER'") Make Moderator
              button.margin-left-small(v-if="account.account_type=='ADMIN'") Remove Admin
              button.margin-left-small(v-if="account.account_type=='MODERATOR'") Remove Moderator
              button.margin-left-small(v-if="account.account_type=='USER'") Block User
              button.margin-left-small Notify User


      
</template>

<script>
import Modal from '@/components/reusable/modal.vue'
export default {

  components: {
    'modal': Modal
  },
  created(){
    this.$store.dispatch('getAllUsers')
  }
}
  
</script>
